default_policy.title: Default Authorization Policy
default_policy.description: The default policy applied to all authorization requests unrelated to OpenID Connect 1.0.

networks.title: Named Networks
networks.description: The list of named networks which can be reused in any ACL rule.

rules.title: Rules List
rules.description: The list of ACL rules to enumerate for requests.

AccessControl.description: AccessControl represents the configuration related to ACLs.

name.title: Network Name
name.description: The name of this network to be used in the networks section of the rules section.

networks.title: Networks
networks.description: The remote IP's or network ranges in CIDR notation that this rule applies to.

AccessControlNetwork.description: AccessControlNetwork represents one ACL network group entry.

domain.title: Domain Literals
domain.description: The literal domains to match the domain against that this rule applies to.

domain_regex.title: Domain Regex Patterns
domain_regex.description: The regex patterns to match the domain against that this rule applies to.

policy.title: Rule Policy
policy.description: The policy this rule applies when all criteria match.

subject.title: AccessControlRuleSubjects
subject.description: The users or groups that this rule applies to.

networks.title: Networks
networks.description: The remote IP's, network ranges in CIDR notation, or network names that this rule applies to.

resources.title: Resources or Paths
resources.description: The regex patterns to match the resource paths that this rule applies to.

methods.description: The list of request methods this rule applies to.

query.title: Query Rules
query.description: The list of query parameter rules this rule applies to.

AccessControlRule.description: AccessControlRule represents one ACL rule entry.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: The list of query parameter rules this rule applies to.

key.title: Key
key.description: The Query Parameter key this rule applies to.

value.title: Value
value.description: The Query Parameter value for this rule.

AccessControlRuleQuery.description: AccessControlRuleQuery represents the ACL query criteria.

password_reset.title: Password Reset
password_reset.description: Allows configuration of the password reset behaviour.

refresh_interval.title: Refresh Interval
refresh_interval.description: How frequently the user details are refreshed from the backend.

AuthenticationBackend.description: AuthenticationBackend represents the configuration related to the authentication backend.

path.title: Path
path.description: The file path to the user database.

watch.title: Watch
watch.description: Enables watching the file for external changes and dynamically reloading the database.

password.title: Password Options
password.description: Allows configuration of the password hashing options when the user passwords are changed directly by Authelia.

AuthenticationBackendFile.description: AuthenticationBackendFile represents the configuration related to file-based backend.

algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: The password hashing algorithm to use.

argon2.title: Argon2
argon2.description: Configure the Argon2 password hashing parameters.

sha2crypt.title: SHA2Crypt
sha2crypt.description: Configure the SHA2Crypt password hashing parameters.

pbkdf2.title: PBKDF2
pbkdf2.description: Configure the PBKDF2 password hashing parameters.

bcrypt.title: BCrypt
bcrypt.description: Configure the BCrypt password hashing parameters.

scrypt.title: SCrypt
scrypt.description: Configure the SCrypt password hashing parameters.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Deprecated: Use individual password options instead.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Deprecated: Use individual password options instead.

parallelism.title: Parallelism
parallelism.description: Deprecated: Use individual password options instead.

key_length.title: Key Length
key_length.description: Deprecated: Use individual password options instead.

salt_length.title: Salt Length
salt_length.description: Deprecated: Use individual password options instead.

AuthenticationBackendFilePassword.description: AuthenticationBackendFilePassword represents the configuration related to password hashing.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: The Argon2 variant to be used.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: The number of Argon2 iterations (parameter t) to be used.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: The Argon2 amount of memory in kibibytes (parameter m) to be used.

parallelism.title: Parallelism
parallelism.description: The Argon2 degree of parallelism (parameter p) to be used.

AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordArgon2.description: AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordArgon2 represents the argon2 hashing settings.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: The BCrypt variant to be used.

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: The BCrypt cost to be used.

AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordBCrypt.description: AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordBCrypt represents the bcrypt hashing settings.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: The PBKDF2 variant to be used.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: The PBKDF2 iterations to be used.

salt_length.title: Salt Length
salt_length.description: The PBKDF2 salt length to be used.

AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordPBKDF2.description: AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordPBKDF2 represents the PBKDF2 hashing settings.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: The SCrypt iterations to be used.

block_size.title: Key Length
block_size.description: The SCrypt block size to be used.

parallelism.title: Key Length
parallelism.description: The SCrypt parallelism factor to be used.

key_length.title: Key Length
key_length.description: The SCrypt key length to be used.

salt_length.title: Salt Length
salt_length.description: The SCrypt salt length to be used.

AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordSCrypt.description: AuthenticationBackendFilePasswordSCrypt represents the scrypt hashing settings.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: The SHA2Crypt variant to be used.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: The SHA2Crypt iterations (parameter rounds) to be used.

salt_length.title: Salt Length
salt_length.description: The SHA2Crypt salt length to be used.

email.title: Email Searching
email.description: Allows users to either use their username or their configured email as a username.

case_insensitive.title: Case Insensitive Searching
case_insensitive.description: Allows usernames to be any case during the search.

AuthenticationBackendFileSearch.description: AuthenticationBackendFileSearch represents the configuration related to file-based backend searching.

address.title: Address
address.description: The address of the LDAP directory server.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: The implementation which mostly decides the default values.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The LDAP directory server connection timeout.

tls.title: TLS
tls.description: The LDAP directory server TLS connection properties.

base_dn.title: Base DN
base_dn.description: The base for all directory server operations.

additional_users_dn.title: Additional User Base
additional_users_dn.description: The base in addition to the Base DN for all directory server operations for users.

users_filter.title: Users Filter
users_filter.description: The LDAP filter used to search for user objects.

additional_groups_dn.title: Additional Group Base
additional_groups_dn.description: The base in addition to the Base DN for all directory server operations for groups.

groups_filter.title: Groups Filter
groups_filter.description: The LDAP filter used to search for group objects.

group_search_mode.title: Groups Search Mode
group_search_mode.description: The LDAP group search mode used to search for group objects.

permit_unauthenticated_bind.title: Permit Unauthenticated Bind
permit_unauthenticated_bind.description: Enables omission of the password to perform an unauthenticated bind.

permit_feature_detection_failure.title: Permit Feature Detection Failure
permit_feature_detection_failure.description: Enables failures when detecting directory server features using the Root DSE lookup.

user.title: User
user.description: The user distinguished name for LDAP binding.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for LDAP authenticated binding.

AuthenticationBackendLDAP.description: AuthenticationBackendLDAP represents the configuration related to LDAP server.

distinguished_name.title: Attribute: Distinguished Name
distinguished_name.description: The directory server attribute which contains the distinguished name for all objects.

username.title: Attribute: User Username
username.description: The directory server attribute which contains the username for all users.

display_name.title: Attribute: User Display Name
display_name.description: The directory server attribute which contains the display name for all users.

mail.title: Attribute: User Mail
mail.description: The directory server attribute which contains the mail address for all users and groups.

MemberOf.title: Attribute: Member Of
MemberOf.description: The directory server attribute which contains the objects that an object is a member of.

group_name.title: Attribute: Group Name
group_name.description: The directory server attribute which contains the group name for all groups.

AuthenticationBackendLDAPAttributes.description: AuthenticationBackendLDAPAttributes represents the configuration related to LDAP server attributes.

custom_url.title: Custom URL
custom_url.description: Disables the internal Password Reset option and instead redirects users to this specified URL.

AuthenticationBackendPasswordReset.description: AuthenticationBackendPasswordReset represents the configuration related to password reset functionality.

theme.title: Theme Name
theme.description: The name of the theme to apply to the web UI.

certificates_directory.title: Certificates Directory Path
certificates_directory.description: The path to a directory which is used to determine the certificates that are trusted.

default_2fa_method.title: Default 2FA method
default_2fa_method.description: When a user logs in for the first time this is the 2FA method configured for them.

default_redirection_url.title: The default redirection URL
default_redirection_url.description: Deprecated: Use the session cookies option with the same name instead.

Configuration.description: Configuration object extracted from YAML configuration file.

hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: The Hostname provided by your Duo API dashboard.

integration_key.title: Integration Key
integration_key.description: The Integration Key provided by your Duo API dashboard.

secret_key.title: Secret Key
secret_key.description: The Secret Key provided by your Duo API dashboard.

DuoAPI.description: DuoAPI represents the configuration related to Duo API.

IdentityProviders.description: IdentityProviders represents the Identity Providers configuration for Authelia.

hmac_secret.title: HMAC Secret
hmac_secret.description: The HMAC Secret used to sign Access Tokens.

jwks.title: Issuer JSON Web Keys
jwks.description: The JWK's which are to be used to sign various objects like ID Tokens.

enable_client_debug_messages.title: Enable Client Debug Messages
enable_client_debug_messages.description: Enables additional debug messages for clients.

minimum_parameter_entropy.title: Minimum Parameter Entropy
minimum_parameter_entropy.description: The minimum entropy of the nonce parameter.

enforce_pkce.title: Enforce PKCE
enforce_pkce.description: Controls enforcement of the use of Proof Key for Code Exchange on all clients.

enable_pkce_plain_challenge.title: Enable PKCE Plain Challenge
enable_pkce_plain_challenge.description: Enables use of the discouraged plain Proof Key for Code Exchange challenges.

enable_jwt_access_token_stateless_intros.title: Enable JWT Access Token Stateless Introspection
enable_jwt_access_token_stateless_intros.description: Allows the use of stateless introspection of JWT Access Tokens which is not recommended.

discovery_signed_response_alg.title: Discovery Response Signing Algorithm
discovery_signed_response_alg.description: The Algorithm this provider uses to sign the Discovery and Metadata Document responses.

discovery_signed_response_key_id.title: Discovery Response Signing Key ID
discovery_signed_response_key_id.description: The Key ID this provider uses to sign the Discovery and Metadata Document responses (overrides the 'discovery_signed_response_alg').

require_pushed_authorization_requests.title: Require Pushed Authorization Requests
require_pushed_authorization_requests.description: Requires Pushed Authorization Requests for all clients for this Issuer.

cors.title: CORS
cors.description: Configuration options for Cross-Origin Request Sharing.

issuer_certificate_chain.title: Issuer Certificate Chain
issuer_certificate_chain.description: The Issuer Certificate Chain with an RSA Public Key used to sign ID Tokens.

issuer_private_key.title: Issuer Private Key
issuer_private_key.description: The Issuer Private Key with an RSA Private Key used to sign ID Tokens.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnect.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnect represents the configuration for OpenID Connect 1.0.

endpoints.title: Endpoints
endpoints.description: List of endpoints to enable CORS handling for.

allowed_origins.title: Allowed Origins
allowed_origins.description: List of arbitrary allowed origins for CORS requests.

allowed_origins_from_client_redirect_uri.title: Allowed Origins From Client Redirect URIs
allowed_origins_from_client_redirect_uri.description: Automatically include the redirect URIs from the registered clients.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectCORS.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectCORS represents an OpenID Connect 1.0 CORS config.

client_name.title: Client Name
client_name.description: The Client Name displayed to End-Users.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret for Client Authentication.

sector_identifier_uri.title: Sector Identifier URI
sector_identifier_uri.description: The Client Sector Identifier URI for Privacy Isolation via Pairwise subject types.

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: The Scopes this client is allowed request and be granted.

grant_types.title: Grant Types
grant_types.description: The Grant Types this client is allowed to use for the protected endpoints.

response_types.title: Response Types
response_types.description: The Response Types the client is authorized to request.

response_modes.title: Response Modes
response_modes.description: The Response Modes this client is authorized request.

authorization_policy.title: Authorization Policy
authorization_policy.description: The Authorization Policy to apply to this client.

lifespan.title: Lifespan Name
lifespan.description: The name of the custom lifespan to utilize for this client.

requested_audience_mode.title: Requested Audience Mode
requested_audience_mode.description: The Requested Audience Mode used for this client.

consent_mode.title: Consent Mode
consent_mode.description: The Consent Mode used for this client.

pre_configured_consent_duration.title: Pre-Configured Consent Duration
pre_configured_consent_duration.description: The Pre-Configured Consent Duration when using Consent Mode pre-configured for this client.

require_pushed_authorization_requests.title: Require Pushed Authorization Requests
require_pushed_authorization_requests.description: Requires Pushed Authorization Requests for this client to perform an authorization.

require_pkce.title: Require PKCE
require_pkce.description: Requires a Proof Key for this client to perform Code Exchange.

pkce_challenge_method.title: PKCE Challenge Method
pkce_challenge_method.description: The PKCE Challenge Method enforced on this client.

authorization_signed_response_alg.title: Authorization Response Signing Algorithm
authorization_signed_response_alg.description: The Authorization Endpoint Signing Algorithm this client uses.

authorization_signed_response_key_id.title: Authorization Response Signing Key ID
authorization_signed_response_key_id.description: The Key ID this client uses to sign the Authorization responses (overrides the 'authorization_signed_response_alg').

id_token_signed_response_alg.title: ID Token Signing Algorithm
id_token_signed_response_alg.description: The algorithm (JWA) this client uses to sign ID Tokens.

id_token_signed_response_key_id.title: ID Token Signing Key ID
id_token_signed_response_key_id.description: The Key ID this client uses to sign ID Tokens (overrides the 'id_token_signing_alg').

access_token_signed_response_alg.title: Access Token Signing Algorithm
access_token_signed_response_alg.description: The algorithm (JWA) this client uses to sign Access Tokens.

access_token_signed_response_key_id.title: Access Token Signing Key ID
access_token_signed_response_key_id.description: The Key ID this client uses to sign Access Tokens (overrides the 'access_token_signed_response_alg').

userinfo_signed_response_alg.title: UserInfo Response Signing Algorithm
userinfo_signed_response_alg.description: The UserInfo Endpoint Signing Algorithm this client uses.

userinfo_signed_response_key_id.title: UserInfo Response Signing Key ID
userinfo_signed_response_key_id.description: The Key ID this client uses to sign the UserInfo responses (overrides the 'userinfo_signed_response_alg').

introspection_signed_response_alg.title: Introspection Response Signing Algorithm
introspection_signed_response_alg.description: The Introspection Endpoint Signing Algorithm this client uses.

introspection_signed_response_key_id.title: Introspection Response Signing Key ID
introspection_signed_response_key_id.description: The Key ID this client uses to sign the Introspection responses (overrides the 'introspection_signed_response_alg').

request_object_signing_alg.title: Request Object Signing Algorithm
request_object_signing_alg.description: The Request Object Signing Algorithm the provider accepts for this client.

token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg.title: Token Endpoint Auth Signing Algorithm
token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg.description: The Token Endpoint Auth Signing Algorithm the provider accepts for this client.

token_endpoint_auth_method.title: Token Endpoint Auth Method
token_endpoint_auth_method.description: The Token Endpoint Auth Method enforced by the provider for this client.

allow_multiple_auth_methods.title: Allow Multiple Authentication Methods
allow_multiple_auth_methods.description: Permits this registered client to accept misbehaving clients which use a broad authentication approach. This is not standards complaint, use at your own security risk.

jwks_uri.title: JSON Web Keys URI
jwks_uri.description: URI of the JWKS endpoint which contains the Public Keys used to validate request objects and the 'private_key_jwt' client authentication method for this client.

jwks.title: JSON Web Keys
jwks.description: List of arbitrary Public Keys used to validate request objects and the 'private_key_jwt' client authentication method for this client.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectClient.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectClient represents a configuration for an OpenID Connect 1.0 client.

access_token.title: Access Token Lifespan
access_token.description: The duration an Access Token is valid for.

authorize_code.title: Authorize Code Lifespan
authorize_code.description: The duration an Authorization Code is valid for.

id_token.title: ID Token Lifespan
id_token.description: The duration an ID Token is valid for.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token Lifespan
refresh_token.description: The duration a Refresh Token is valid for.

grants.title: Grant Types
grants.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for individual grant types.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectLifespan.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectLifespan allows tuning the lifespans for OpenID Connect 1.0 issued tokens.

authorize_code.title: Authorize Code Grant
authorize_code.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for the authorize code grant.

implicit.title: Implicit Grant
implicit.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for the implicit flow and grant.

client_credentials.title: Client Credentials Grant
client_credentials.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for the client credentials grant.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token Grant
refresh_token.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for the refresh token grant.

jwt_bearer.title: JWT Bearer Grant
jwt_bearer.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for the JWT bearer grant.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectLifespanGr.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectLifespanGrants allows tuning the lifespans for each grant type.

access_token.title: Access Token Lifespan
access_token.description: The duration an Access Token is valid for.

authorize_code.title: Authorize Code Lifespan
authorize_code.description: The duration an Authorization Code is valid for.

id_token.title: ID Token Lifespan
id_token.description: The duration an ID Token is valid for.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token Lifespan
refresh_token.description: The duration a Refresh Token is valid for.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectLifespanTo.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectLifespanToken allows tuning the lifespans for each token type.

access_token.title: Access Token Lifespan
access_token.description: The duration an Access Token is valid for.

authorize_code.title: Authorize Code Lifespan
authorize_code.description: The duration an Authorization Code is valid for.

id_token.title: ID Token Lifespan
id_token.description: The duration an ID Token is valid for.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token Lifespan
refresh_token.description: The duration a Refresh Token is valid for.

jwt_secured_authorization.title: JARM
jwt_secured_authorization.description: Allows tuning the token lifespan for the JWT Secured Authorization Response Mode (JARM).

custom.title: Custom Lifespans
custom.description: Allows creating custom lifespans to be used by individual clients.

default_policy.title: Default Policy
default_policy.description: The default policy action for this policy.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: The list of rules for this policy.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectPolicy.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectPolicy configuration for OpenID Connect 1.0 authorization policies.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: The policy to apply to this rule.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Allows tuning the token lifespans for the authorize code grant.

IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectPolicyRule.description: IdentityProvidersOpenIDConnectPolicyRule configuration for OpenID Connect 1.0 authorization policies rules.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: Identity Validation options for the Reset Password flow.

elevated_session.title: Elevated Session
elevated_session.description: Identity Validation options for obtaining an Elevated Session for flows such as the Credential Management flows.

IdentityValidation.description: IdentityValidation represents the configuration for identity verification actions/flows.

code_lifespan.title: Code Lifespan
code_lifespan.description: The lifespan of the randomly generated One Time Code after which it's considered invalid.

elevation_lifespan.title: Elevation Lifespan
elevation_lifespan.description: The lifespan of the elevation after initially validating the One-Time Code before it expires.

otp_characters.title: OTP Characters
otp_characters.description: Number of characters in the generated OTP codes.

require_second_factor.title: Require Second Factor
require_second_factor.description: Requires the user use a second factor if they have any known second factor methods.

skip_second_factor.title: Skip Second Factor
skip_second_factor.description: Skips the primary identity verification process if the user has authenticated with a second factor.

IdentityValidationElevatedSession.description: IdentityValidationElevatedSession represents the tunable aspects of the credential control identity verification action/flow.

jwt_lifespan.title: JWT Lifespan
jwt_lifespan.description: The lifespan of the JSON Web Token after it's initially generated after which it's considered invalid.

jwt_algorithm.title: JWT Algorithm
jwt_algorithm.description: The JSON Web Token Algorithm (JWA) used to sign the Reset Password flow JSON Web Token's.

jwt_secret.title: JWT Secret
jwt_secret.description: The secret key used to sign the Reset Password flow JSON Web Token's.

IdentityValidationResetPassword.description: IdentityValidationResetPassword represents the tunable aspects of the reset password identity verification action/flow.

key.description: The Private/Public key material of this JWK in Base64 PEM format.

certificate_chain.title: Certificate Chain
certificate_chain.description: The optional associated certificate which matches the Key public key portion for this JWK.

level.title: Level
level.description: The minimum Level a Log message must be before it's added to the log.

file_path.title: File Path
file_path.description: The File Path to save the logs to instead of sending them to stdout, it's strongly recommended this option is only enabled with 'keep_stdout' also enabled.

keep_stdout.title: Keep Stdout
keep_stdout.description: Enables keeping stdout when using the File Path option.

address.title: NTP Address
address.description: The remote address of the NTP server.

max_desync.title: Maximum Desync
max_desync.description: The maximum amount of time that the server can be out of sync.

disable_startup_check.title: Disable Startup Check
disable_startup_check.description: Disables the NTP Startup Check entirely.

disable_failure.title: Disable Failure
disable_failure.description: Disables complete failure whe the Startup Check fails and instead just logs the error.

NTP.description: NTP represents the configuration related to ntp server.

template_path.title: Template Path
template_path.description: The path for notifier template overrides.

Notifier.description: Notifier represents the configuration of the notifier to use when sending notifications to users.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: The file path of the notifications.

NotifierFileSystem.description: NotifierFileSystem represents the configuration of the notifier writing emails in a file.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier used during the HELO/EHLO command.

startup_check_address.title: Startup Check Address
startup_check_address.description: The address used for the recipient in the startup check.

disable_require_tls.title: Disable Require TLS
disable_require_tls.description: Disables the requirement to use TLS.

disable_html_emails.title: Disable HTML Emails
disable_html_emails.description: Disables the mixed content type of emails and only sends the plaintext version.

disable_starttls.title: Disable StartTLS
disable_starttls.description: Disables the opportunistic StartTLS functionality which is useful for bad SMTP servers which advertise support for it but don't actually support it.

tls.title: TLS
tls.description: The SMTP server TLS connection properties.

NotifierSMTP.description: NotifierSMTP represents the configuration of the SMTP server to send emails with.

PasswordPolicy.description: PasswordPolicy represents the configuration related to password policy.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enables the standard password policy engine.

PasswordPolicyStandard.description: PasswordPolicyStandard represents the configuration related to standard parameters of password policy.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Enables the ZXCVBN password policy engine.

PasswordPolicyZXCVBN.description: PasswordPolicyZXCVBN represents the configuration related to ZXCVBN parameters of password policy.

require_user_acceptance.title: Require User Acceptance
require_user_acceptance.description: Enables the requirement for users to accept the policy.

policy_url.title: Policy URL
policy_url.description: The URL of the privacy policy.

PrivacyPolicy.description: PrivacyPolicy is the privacy policy configuration.

max_retries.title: Maximum Retries
max_retries.description: The maximum number of failed attempts permitted before banning a user.

find_time.title: Find Time
find_time.description: The amount of time to consider when determining the number of failed attempts.

ban_time.title: Ban Time
ban_time.description: The amount of time to ban the user for when it's determined the maximum retries has been exceeded.

Regulation.description: Regulation represents the configuration related to regulation.

asset_path.title: Asset Path
asset_path.description: The directory where the server asset overrides reside.

Server.description: Server represents the configuration of the http server.

enable_pprof.title: Enable PProf
enable_pprof.description: Enables the developer specific pprof endpoints which should not be used in production and only used for debugging purposes.

enable_expvars.title: Enable ExpVars
enable_expvars.description: Enables the developer specific ExpVars endpoints which should not be used in production and only used for debugging purposes.

ServerEndpoints.description: ServerEndpoints is the endpoints configuration for the HTTP server.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: The specific Authorization implementation to use for this endpoint.

authn_strategies.title: Authn Strategies
authn_strategies.description: The specific Authorization strategies to use for this endpoint.

ServerEndpointsAuthz.description: ServerEndpointsAuthz is the Authz endpoints configuration for the HTTP server.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Authorization strategy to use.

schemes.title: Authorization Schemes
schemes.description: The name of the authorization schemes to allow with the header strategies.

ServerEndpointsAuthzAuthnStrategy.description: ServerEndpointsAuthzAuthnStrategy is the Authz endpoints configuration for the HTTP server.

csp_template.title: CSP Template
csp_template.default: default-src 'self'; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'nonce-%s'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'

ServerHeaders.description: ServerHeaders represents the customization of the http server headers.

client_certificates.title: Client Certificates
client_certificates.description: Path to the Client Certificates to trust for mTLS.

ServerTLS.description: ServerTLS represents the configuration of the http servers TLS options.

same_site.description: The session cookie same site value.

expiration.description: The session cookie expiration when remember me is not checked.

remember_me.description: The session cookie expiration when remember me is checked.

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: Secret used to encrypt the session data.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Deprecated: Use the session cookies option with the same name instead.

Session.description: Session represents the configuration related to user sessions.

same_site.description: The session cookie same site value.

expiration.description: The session cookie expiration when remember me is not checked.

remember_me.description: The session cookie expiration when remember me is checked.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The domain for this session cookie configuration.

authelia_url.title: Authelia URL
authelia_url.description: The Root Authelia URL to redirect users to for this session cookie configuration.

default_redirection_url.title: Default Redirection URL
default_redirection_url.description: The default redirection URL for this session cookie configuration.

SessionCookie.description: SessionCookie represents the configuration for a cookie domain.

maximum_active_connections.title: Maximum Active Connections
maximum_active_connections.description: The maximum connections that can be made to redis at one time.

minimum_idle_connections.title: Minimum Idle Connections
minimum_idle_connections.description: The minimum idle connections that should be open to redis.

SessionRedis.description: SessionRedis represents the configuration related to redis session store.

sentinel_name.title: Sentinel Name
sentinel_name.description: The name of the sentinel instance.

sentinel_username.title: Sentinel Username
sentinel_username.description: The username for the sentinel instance.

sentinel_password.title: Sentinel Username
sentinel_password.description: The username for the sentinel instance.

route_by_latency.title: Route by Latency
route_by_latency.description: Uses the Route by Latency mode.

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.description: The pre-populated list of nodes for the sentinel instance.

SessionRedisHighAvailability.description: SessionRedisHighAvailability holds configuration variables for Redis Cluster/Sentinel.

local.title: Local
local.description: The Local SQLite3 Storage configuration settings.

encryption_key.title: Encryption Key
encryption_key.description: The Storage Encryption Key used to secure security sensitive values in the storage engine.

Storage.description: Storage represents the configuration of the storage backend.

path.title: Path
path.description: The Path for the SQLite3 database file.

StorageLocal.description: StorageLocal represents the configuration when using local storage.

database.title: Database
database.description: The database name to use upon a successful connection.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to use to authenticate.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to use to authenticate.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout for the database connection.

StorageMySQL.description: StorageMySQL represents the configuration of a MySQL database.

database.title: Database
database.description: The database name to use upon a successful connection.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to use to authenticate.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to use to authenticate.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout for the database connection.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: The default schema name to use.

ssl.title: SSL
ssl.description: Deprecated: Use the TLS configuration instead.

StoragePostgreSQL.description: StoragePostgreSQL represents the configuration of a PostgreSQL database.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: The SSL mode to use, deprecated and replaced with the TLS options.

root_certificate.title: Root Certificate
root_certificate.description: Path to the Root Certificate to use, deprecated and replaced with the TLS options.

certificate.title: Certificate
certificate.description: Path to the Certificate to use, deprecated and replaced with the TLS options.

key.title: Key
key.description: Path to the Private Key to use, deprecated and replaced with the TLS options.

StoragePostgreSQLSSL.description: StoragePostgreSQLSSL represents the SSL configuration of a PostgreSQL database.

skip_verify.title: Skip Verify
skip_verify.description: Disable all verification of the TLS properties.

server_name.title: Server Name
server_name.description: The expected server name to match the certificate against.

TLS.description: TLS is a representation of the TLS configuration.

issuer.title: Issuer
issuer.description: The issuer value for generated TOTP keys.

algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: The algorithm value for generated TOTP keys.

digits.title: Digits
digits.description: The digits value for generated TOTP keys.

period.title: Period
period.description: The period value for generated TOTP keys.

skew.title: Skew
skew.description: The permitted skew for generated TOTP keys.

secret_size.title: Secret Size
secret_size.description: The secret size for generated TOTP keys.

allowed_algorithms.title: Allowed Algorithms
allowed_algorithms.description: List of algorithms the user is allowed to select in addition to the default.

allowed_digits.title: Allowed Digits
allowed_digits.description: List of digits the user is allowed to select in addition to the default.

allowed_periods.title: Allowed Periods
allowed_periods.description: List of periods the user is allowed to select in addition to the default.

disable_reuse_security_policy.title: Disable Reuse Security Policy
disable_reuse_security_policy.description: Disables the security policy that prevents reuse of a TOTP code.

TOTP.description: TOTP represents the configuration related to TOTP options.

address.title: Address
address.description: The address for the metrics server to listen on.

buffers.title: Buffers
buffers.description: The server buffers configuration for the metrics server.

timeouts.title: Timeouts
timeouts.description: The server timeouts configuration for the metrics server.

TelemetryMetrics.description: TelemetryMetrics represents the telemetry metrics config.

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: The display name attribute for the WebAuthn relying party.

attestation_conveyance_preference.title: Conveyance Preference
attestation_conveyance_preference.description: The default conveyance preference for all WebAuthn credentials.

user_verification.title: User Verification
user_verification.description: The default user verification preference for all WebAuthn credentials.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The default timeout for all WebAuthn ceremonies.
